Title: To do one's utmost for the people -- Study the Communist warrior comrade Yang Shuicai
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: The text in the top corner reads: "I approve of this kind of slogan, known as 'Fearing neither hardship or death' - [signed] Mao Zedong" (我赞成这样的口号，叫做“一不怕苦，二不怕死“- 毛泽东).
